subject: Question about VAM Pro motors.
description_text:
Hello. I recently bought 3 pedals 3 hydraulic with base plate + 2 VAM Pro
motors.

When I tested the vibration in Simsonn software, two motors had different
vibrations. Is this normal? It doesn't feel very normal. How can I fix this?

conversations.body_text: Hi J K,    You can provide a comparison video or description of the motor vibrations. Please note that if the motors are mounted on the bracket in different ways, the vibration sound may vary.  Also, minor differences are normal and will not cause any damage.  If there is any actual damage, we will replace it free of charge, so you can use it with confidence.

Hello. Thanks for quick response.

I'm not really sure if this is normal but I can hear the difference. It
might be the way it's mounted like you said. Please let me know.

Thanks.



On Fri, Sep 19, 2025 at 7:43 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi J K,  Everything appears to be normal, and you can continue using it without concern. If you later experience any interference with the brake signal, please refer to this post and use nylon screws to connect the VAM Pro to the bracket instead of metal screws, which will provide proper isolation.      https://www.reddit.com/r/simracing/comments/1n291hi/solution_for_simsonn_vam_pro_emi_issues/

Ok, I'll keep that in mind. Thanks!

On Fri, Sep 19, 2025 at 11:21 PM service@simsonn.com

Hello.

I've been using the pedals for a few days, it's amazing. However I think
the hydraulic damper on my throttle is being weird.
When I press it down fast, I feel a "bump" midway through, and when I press
it slowly it's smooth like normal.
It wasn't like this until yesterday, and I suddenly started feeling the
"bump" today. How can I fix this?
Hi J K, Please provide your contact person, phone number, and address, and we will send you a new throttle hydraulic lever.

Wonjoon Jang
+14165715440
714-2545 simcoe ST N, Oshawa, Ontario
zip: L1L 0W3

Thanks for the replacement.

On Wed, Sep 24, 2025 at 11:34 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi J K,      We need your order number. Thank you.

Here it is.
02-2913807-0495429


On Thu, Sep 25, 2025 at 6:25 AM service@simsonn.com

Awesome, thanks! I really love these pedals, btw. I'm recommending it to my
friends and strangers.
